data.title: Kenyon Martin, Basketball Player
data.meta_description: Kenyon Martin stats and bio. Stats averages season by season. Quick access to game by game stats.
data.text:
Kenyon Martin - Points

Kenyon Martin scores a career high 35 points (2003)

On February 03, 2003, Kenyon Martin set his career high in points in a NBA game. That day he scored 35 points in New Jersey's home win against Seattle, 109-108. He also had 12 rebounds and 2 blocks. He shot 12/17 from two, 1/1 from three, shooting at 72.2% from the field. He also shot 8/10 from the free-throw line.

Kenyon Martin - Rebounds

Kenyon Martin grabs a career high 21 rebounds (2003)

On January 29, 2003, Kenyon Martin tied his career high in rebounds in a NBA game. That day he grabbed 21 rebounds in New Jersey's home win against Washington, 86-78. He also had 19 points, 8 assists.

Kenyon Martin - Assists

Kenyon Martin gives a career high 11 assists (2001)

On March 05, 2001, Kenyon Martin set his career high in assists in a NBA game. That day he dished 11 assists in New Jersey's home loss against Milwaukee, 100-107. He also had 18 points, 15 rebounds, 2 steals and 3 blocks.

Kenyon Martin - Steals

Kenyon Martin has a career high 7 steals (2009)

On January 15, 2009, Kenyon Martin set his career high in steals in a NBA game. That day he reached 7 steals in Denver's home win against Phoenix, 119-113. He also had 24 points, 8 rebounds and 2 assists.

Kenyon Martin - Blocks

Kenyon Martin blocks a career high 7 shots (2008)

On January 03, 2008, Kenyon Martin set his career high in blocks in a NBA game. That day he went for 7 blocks in Denver's home win against San Antonio, 80-77. He also had 4 points, 7 rebounds and 2 assists.

Kenyon Martin - Efficiency

Kenyon Martin records a career high 43 efficiency rating (2006)

On February 10, 2006, Kenyon Martin set his career high in efficiency in a NBA game. That day he accomplished 43 efficiency in Denver's home win against Dallas, 113-104. He also had 34 points, 9 rebounds and 2 assists.
